Structural Changes.description: Modifications in sentence structure, paragraph flow, or content length.
Structural Changes.sentence_restructuring: Rewriting sentences for better clarity, conciseness, or readability.
Structural Changes.paragraph_reordering: Changing the sequence of ideas for better logical flow.
Structural Changes.summarization_expansion: Shortening or expanding content based on feedback.

Stylistic Adjustments.description: Changes in tone, formality, or politeness of the text.
Stylistic Adjustments.formalization: Making the text more professional or academic.
Stylistic Adjustments.casualization: Making the text more conversational or informal.
Stylistic Adjustments.politeness_adjustments: Adjusting tone to be more diplomatic, polite, or direct.

Argumentation & Logic.description: Improvements in reasoning, logic, and argument strength.
Argumentation & Logic.strengthening_arguments: Adding reasoning, evidence, or counterarguments to support claims.
Argumentation & Logic.fixing_logical_fallacies: Correcting contradictions, circular reasoning, or weak logic.
Argumentation & Logic.shifting_perspective: Modifying stance or viewpoint in response to feedback.

Factual & Informational Updates.description: Corrections and additions that improve factual accuracy and completeness.
Factual & Informational Updates.correcting_errors: Fixing grammatical mistakes, typos, or factual inaccuracies.
Factual & Informational Updates.adding_new_information: Incorporating additional knowledge from the LLM.
Factual & Informational Updates.refining_definitions: Providing clearer or more precise explanations of concepts.

Sentiment & Emotional Adjustments.description: Changes that affect the emotional tone and expressiveness of the text.
Sentiment & Emotional Adjustments.softening_tone: Making the response less aggressive or confrontational.
Sentiment & Emotional Adjustments.emphasizing_emotions: Adding empathetic, encouraging, or expressive language.
Sentiment & Emotional Adjustments.reducing_emotional_bias: Removing subjective or emotionally charged wording.

Lexical & Vocabulary Changes.description: Word-level modifications for clarity, precision, and readability.
Lexical & Vocabulary Changes.replacing_words: Swapping out words for synonyms or more precise terminology.

Persuasion & Engagement Enhancements.description: Refinements that improve engagement, rhetorical impact, and readability.
Persuasion & Engagement Enhancements.adding_rhetorical_devices: Using metaphors, analogies, or rhetorical questions for impact.
Persuasion & Engagement Enhancements.improving_readability: Making the text more engaging and easier to understand.
Persuasion & Engagement Enhancements.targeting_audience: Adjusting phrasing to better align with the intended reader.

Compliance & Ethical Adjustments.description: Edits that align the text with ethical, legal, or community norms.
Compliance & Ethical Adjustments.aligning_with_guidelines: Following ethical, legal, or community norms.
Compliance & Ethical Adjustments.de_biasing_stereotypes: Eliminating gendered, racial, or other biased language.
